name: CANTEEN CORPORATION, Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant

parties: CANTEEN CORPORATION, Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of July, 2004, the order of the Commonwealth Court entered in Canteen Corp. v. Commonwealth, 818 A.2d 594 (Pa.Cmwlth.2003), is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Michael Adam Roman, Clinton G. Smith, Harrisburg, for Com.
Robert R. Batt, Peter L. Faber, for Pro-Hac-Vice.
casebody.head_matter:
854 A.2d 440
CANTEEN CORPORATION, Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 20, 2004.
Michael Adam Roman, Clinton G. Smith, Harrisburg, for Com.
Robert R. Batt, Peter L. Faber, for Pro-Hac-Vice.
